name: Galarian Rapidash
flavorText: Brave and prideful, this Pokémon dashes airily through the forest, its steps aided by the psychic power stored in the fur on its fetlocks.

abilities.name: Pastel Veil
abilities.text: Your Pokémon recover from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
